page.title: 12Housing in Milnathort
page.content: Housing in Milnathort ranges from 18th c. cottages and family houses to modern bungalows and villas. In the main streets many houses are on the first floor above shops. {Burleigh Estate}takes its name from {Burleigh Castle.}It is a very modern development of between 30 and 40 homes on the eastern edge of Milnathort. Building began in 1981 and is continu- ing still(summer 1985). They are quite expensive, which may be why they were slow to sell at first. A group of local authority (District Council) houses form a street on the higher land of the village. This is Viewfar Road, where many of the houses are let to fairly young families. This group contrasts sharply with some of the large, private houses nearby which have spacious rooms and secluded gardens.
